short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For Notion. Development of this extension is in stop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Development of this extension has been discontinued and is deprecated.

Chrome Extension to tweak Notion.

Features
„ÉªOpen or Create Today's Page of a specific database
„ÉªCreate Page of a specific database quickly
„ÉªEnter the timestamp(HH:mm) quickly
„ÉªClose Slash command menu and Emoji menu
„ÉªNarrow the page margins when page width is less than 850px
„ÉªNarrow the margin at the bottom of Code Block
„ÉªAlways show the language of Code Block
